Fetch All¶

Functions for Pulling data from ES and unpacking into a table

fetch_all.es_search(es_host, es_index, query_body='{}', size=10000, max_hits=None, scroll='5m')[source]¶

Execute a query to elasticsearch and get a DataFrame back

Args:

es_host (string): a url of the elasticsearch cluster e.g. http://localhost:9200 es_index (string): the name of the ES index query_body (json): json query size (int): the number of hits per page. Note: the size will not affect max_hits,

but it will affect the time to return the max_hits.

max_hits (int, None): the total number of hits to allow. If None, no limit scroll (str): the time to keep the scroll context alive for each page

Return:
A pandas DataFrame

Uptasticsearch
